details.arabic_diacless: اللٰه، اللٰه ربي لا أشرك به شيئا
details.arabic: اَللّٰهُ، اَللّٰهُ رَبِّيْ لَا أُشْرِكُ بِهِ شَيْئًا
details.translations: Allah, Allah is my Lord. I do not associate anything with Him.
details.reference: Abu Dawud 2/87 No. 1525,Ibn Maah No. 3882, Also see Sahih Ibn Majah 2/335
